name: tony rawr 🐯🛹
description:
a small game on finding where you belong, skateboarding and cute animals. 

🐯🛹

use WASD or arrow keys to move and interact with people (animals) or objects

you can also play on mobile by swiping your way :)

(the game ends after the store opening)

please let me know if there are any english mistakes.

thanks to all my friends

made in Bitsy

music by Rrrrose
